regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <item><title> [COLOR red][makelist.param1] [/COLOR] [COLOR yellow][makelist.param2] [/COLOR] [COLOR red][makelist.param3] [/COLOR] [COLOR yellow][makelist.param4] [/COLOR] [COLOR red][B][makelist.param5] [/B] [/COLOR] [COLOR yellow]Canal [makelist.param6] - [makelist.param7] [/COLOR] </title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=TVCHOCO[makelist.param5]+Arenavision</link> <regex> <name>hash</name> <expres>this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://arenavision.top/[makelist.param6]</page> <referer>http://arenavision.top/</referer> <setcookie>beget=begetok</setcookie> </regex> <thumbnail>https://i2.wp.com/rojillo.es/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/warenavision.png</thumbnail> </item>

item:
plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[hash]&mode=1&name=Acestream
hash this.loadPlayer\("(.*?)" http://www.arenavision.in/02 http://www.arenavision.in beget=begetok
https://i2.wp.com/rojillo.es/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/warenavision.png ArenaVision 2
